scripts.android:shake: $ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools/adb devices | grep '\t' | awk '{print $1}' | sed 's/\s//g' | xargs -I {} $ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools/adb -s {} shell input keyevent 82
scripts.ios:createBundle: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.createIconFont: yarn run generateIconFontComponent && yarn run copyIconFontToNodeModules
scripts.clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && npm cache clean
scripts.removeCachedFiles: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf ios/build/ModuleCache/* && rm -rf ios/build/* && rm -rf node_modules/*
scripts.removeCachedMetro: npm cache clean --force && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/com.facebook.ReactNativeBuild && yarn cache clean && rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-bundler-cache-*
scripts.newclear: yarn run removeCachedFiles && yarn run removeCachedMetro && yarn add cache clean && yarn run android:clean && yarn run fix-xcode && yarn run createIconFont
scripts.podInstall: cd ios && rm -rf Pods/* && rm -rf Podfile.lock && pod install && cd ..
scripts.codePush: code-push release-react app-ios ios && code-push release-react app-android android
scripts.codePushProduction: code-push promote app-ios Staging Production && code-push promote app-android Staging Production
